thread.title: North Hills releases Beach Music schedule
thread.title_full: North Hills releases Beach Music schedule

title: North Hills releases Beach Music schedule
text:
North Hills releases Beach Music schedule Tags:     More on this North Hills By Kathy Hanrahan 
Raleigh, N.C. — The weather should be getting warmer soon and that means it is almost time to enjoy some live music in North Hills. 
The Midtown Beach Music Series is celebrating its 10th year. The lineup was released on Monday. 
Here's the dates: April 20 – The Embers Featuring Craig Woolard April 27 – Liquid Pleasure May 11 – Legacy Motown Revue May 18 – Band of Oz May 25 – Tams June 8 – Steve Owens and Summertime June 15 – Chairman of the Board June 22 – Jim Quick and the Coastline June 29 – Blackwater Rhythm and Blues July 6 – Spare Change July 20 – Too Much Sylvia July 27 – North Tower August 3 – Band of Oz Aug. 10 - Liquid Pleasure Aug. 17 - The Embers Featuring Craig Woolard​ 
These free shows are 6 p.m. to 9 p.m. in the commons area. Credits
